flawed_nl_solution:
In the first week, Jed has 20 + 6 = <<20+6=30>>30 cards.
In the second week, he has 30 + 6 = <<30+6=36>>36 cards.
But he is left with 36 - 2 = <<36-2=34>>34 cards on the 2nd week after giving 2 cards to his friend.
Then Jed has 34 + 6 = <<34+6=40>>40 cards on the 3rd week.
He has 40 + 6 = <<40+6=46>>46 cards on the 4th week.
After giving his friend 2 cards, he is then left with 46 - 2 = <<46-2=44>>44 cards on the 4th week.
